channel.title: Sed on 水行舟
channel.description: Recent content in Sed on 水行舟

item.title: sed学习要点
item.description: The acronym SED stands for Stream EDitor. It is a simple yet powerful utility that parses the text and transforms it seamlessly. SED was developed during 1973–74 by Lee E. McMahon of Bell Labs. Today, it runs on all major operating systems.
